action.action-desc: Mr. Tester (for himself and Mr. Udall) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To exempt the Indian Health Service, the Bureau of Indian Affairs, and certain other programs for Indians from sequestration.

section.header: Sequestration exemption for certain Indian programs

subsection.text: Section 255 of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (2 U.S.C. 905) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (k) as subsection (l); and
by inserting after subsection (j) the following:

subsection.header: Indian Health Service and other Indian programs
subsection.text: The following programs shall be exempt from reduction under any order issued under this part:

list.list-item: All programs administered by the Bureau of Indian Affairs.
All programs under the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 (25 U.S.C. 4101 et seq.).

subsection.text: Section 256(e) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (2 U.S.C. 906(e)) is amended—
